original_name: Stripped Down Live with Curt Smith
plot: A live music show hosted by Tears For Fears co-founder Curt Smith. Each episode a different band or musician plays live in studio. Between sets Smith interviews the artists and takes questions from the show's audience.
plot_en: A live music show hosted by Tears For Fears co-founder Curt Smith. Each episode a different band or musician plays live in studio. Between sets Smith interviews the artists and takes questions from the show's audience.
plot_es: A live music show hosted by Tears For Fears co-founder Curt Smith. Each episode a different band or musician plays live in studio. Between sets Smith interviews the artists and takes questions from the show's audience.
title: Stripped Down Live with Curt Smith
